content:
There's quite a few open libs FCP checkboxes right now. I think these eight are simple enough to be checked right away without costing much time or discussion:

  • stabilize const_int_pow (37 days) (BurntSushi, sfackler, withoutboats)
  • Stabilize IpAddr::is_ipv4 and is_ipv6 as const (36 days) (BurntSushi, sfackler, withoutboats)
  • Impl Default for PhantomPinned (28 days) (BurntSushi, sfackler, withoutboats)
  • Plan to make core and std's panic identical (RFC) (13 days) (Amanieu, BurntSushi, sfackler, withoutboats)
  • Implement PartialEq for proc_macro::Ident == strings (11 days) (Amanieu, KodrAus, withoutboats)
  • Add PartialEq<char> for proc_macro::Punct (11 days) (Amanieu, KodrAus, sfackler, withoutboats)
  • Stabilize alloc::Layout const functions (6 days) (Amanieu, sfackler, withoutboats)
  • Stabilize refcell_take (3 days) (Amanieu, KodrAus, withoutboats)

(ping @Amanieu @BurntSushi @Ashley Mannix @Steven Fackler @boats)
